About me

Web developer with a self-taught background, passionate about creating beautiful and functional websites. Gained a thorough understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript by studying and working on projects from The Odin Project. Familiarity with SCSS, Webpack, Linux, Terminal, VS Code, GitHub, and Git.

Currently studying the React libary and plan to start learning back-end coding with the goal of working as a full-stack developer in the near future.
